entries.title: Steam's Year in Review serves up highlights of your 2022 playtime
entries.description: How many games did you launch in 2022? Valve knows.

entries.title: PC Gamer Hardware Awards: The best gaming monitors of 2022
entries.description: OLED versus LCD. There can be only one winner...

entries.title: PC Gamer Hardware Awards: The best gaming laptops of 2022
entries.description: So many gaming laptops deserve the crown this year—here are our three nominees.

entries.title: Here are the biggest PC gaming hardware stories of 2022
entries.description: 2022 had its fair share of new hardware controversy, crypto drama, and plenty of Gabe.

entries.title: All the big games that shut down in 2022
entries.description: The past year saw a number of big games closed for good—some we'll miss, and others we've already forgotten about.

entries.title: Embrace the cringe in your heart and join me in loving Neon White's dialogue
It's not just you: spam is back
entries.description: Elon Musk and the pandemic are partly to blame.

entries.title: The best MMO stories of 2022
entries.description: From red hot schadenfreude to waking slumbering dragons, the year in community stories.

entries.title: Dorfromantik was 2022's 'no thoughts, just vibes' game of the year
entries.description: No game soothed me this past year like this idyllic tile-placer.

entries.title: The next BioShock should return to the fundamentals laid down by System Shock 2
entries.description: A true sense of place is well-earned, as Irrational’s first-ever game demonstrates.

entries.title: Roadwarden is the first text adventure I enjoyed as much as a good book
entries.description: Roadwarden is far more approachable than classic text games with worldbuilding on par with my favorite novels.

entries.title: Learning cheaters never prosper in WWE 2K22
entries.description: Can the world's most pathetic wrestler capture the gold without winning a match fairly?

entries.title: Today's Wordle 555 answer and hint for Monday, December 26
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #555 puzzle.
